alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL FRANKLIN...CRAWFORD AND NORTHERN SEBASTIAN COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles north of Chester to near Rudy. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Arkoma... Mulberry... Dyer... Chester... Rudy... Lake Fort Smith... Figure Five... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Fern... Kibler... Concord... Shibley... Mill Creek... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 1 and 24. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
